item.title: Getting started with omnet++
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting omnet++ set up or installed.

item.title: Simulation of VANETs using OMNeT++ and Artery
item.description: This documentation will give you a insight how European VANETs based on the ETSI ITS-G5 and IEEE 802.11p can be simulated by using the discrete event simulator OMNeT++. The Artery Simulation Framework # Artery (https://github.com/riebl/artery) is a simulation framework for OMNeT++. It is designed to simulate the ETSI ITS-G5 protocol stack which is used in European VANETs. Currently, it is using OMNeT++ in version 5.0. It is completely open source and under active development.
